casebody.data:
The State of Ohio, Appellee, v. Ridenour, Appellant.

[Cite as State v. Ridenour, 102 Ohio St.3d 404, 2004-Ohio-3592.]

(No. 2004-0354 Submitted June 29, 2004 Decided July 21, 2004.) James Dean Bennett, Miami County Prosecuting Attorney, and Gary Allen Nasal, Assistant Prosecuting Attorney, for appellee. David H. Bodiker, State Public Defender, and Charles B. Clovis, Assistant Public Defender, for appellant.

{¶ 1} The judgment of the court of appeals is affirmed on the authority of State v. Evans, 102 Ohio St.3d 240, 2004-Ohio-2659, 809 N.E.2d 11.

Moyer, C.J., Resnick, F.E. Sweeney, Pfeifer, Lundberg Stratton, O’Connor and O’Donnell, JJ., concur.
